title: Difficulty identifying this beautiful font
content:
[http://www.pinterest.com/pin/500321839825599679/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414031545/http:/www.pinterest.com/pin/500321839825599679/ "http://www.pinterest.com/pin/500321839825599679/")

Could anyone help me identify this font? tried all outlets but its extremely difficult.

Thanks in advance

Krishna
author: krishnasriram

comments.content:
I trust you will get a good answer if you post your request at the Font Identification forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414031545/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Look forward to seeing you there.  
Don
